content:
Scenario: Future career aligned with ecological care economy
    Given Kenji studies environmental science for future career
    And he wants work that serves ecological flourishing
    When the bioregional_elohim supports career development
    Then it should help him identify care economy environmental careers
    And it should connect his learning to ecological stewardship work
    And it should validate environmental work as care economy contribution
    And it should support him developing career serving planetary flourishing
    And the system should recognize ecological professions as care work
    And Kenji's career should serve care economy at planetary scale
